title: Geosteer a Horizontal Well
description: A geologist uses real-time LWD data to 'steer' a horizontal well, keeping it within a thin, high-quality reservoir layer.

tasks.description: Display the real-time gamma ray log from the LWD tool on a cross-section view with the planned well path.
tasks.expected_outcome: A live view shows the well's current position relative to the target reservoir.

tasks.description: The gamma ray reading indicates the well is drilling too close to the upper shale layer. Interpret the new position of the reservoir.
tasks.expected_outcome: The geologist determines the well needs to be steered downwards.

tasks.description: Send a new directional drilling target (inclination and azimuth) to the directional driller to steer the well back into the center of the reservoir.
tasks.expected_outcome: New drilling targets are sent and acknowledged by the driller.
